site.title: Fineksi - AI-Powered Document Automation for Financial Institutions
site.description: Transform your credit process with advanced AI document automation, fraud detection, and cognitive analysis. Trusted by banks, multifinance, and P2P lending platforms.
site.name: Fineksi

hero.title: Transform Your Credit Process with AI Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Harness the power of advanced AI to streamline document processing, detect tampering with neural networks, and accelerate credit decisions with our cognitive automation platform.

features.title: Advanced AI Capabilities for Modern Finance
features.subtitle: Our neural network-powered platform combines cutting-edge machine learning with deep financial expertise to revolutionize your credit operations with unprecedented accuracy.

ai_document.title: AI Document Processing
ai_document.description: Neural networks automatically extract, classify, and process financial documents with 99.8% accuracy. Advanced OCR and NLP handle any document format.

fraud_detection.title: AI Fraud Detection
fraud_detection.description: Deep learning algorithms analyze pixel-level patterns to detect document manipulation, alterations, and sophisticated forgeries with 99.9% accuracy.

cognitive_analysis.title: Cognitive Credit Analysis
cognitive_analysis.description: Advanced AI models analyze 500+ financial indicators to provide intelligent credit risk assessments and predictive insights for optimal decision-making.

lightning_fast.title: Lightning-Fast AI
lightning_fast.description: GPU-accelerated processing handles complete loan applications in seconds. Parallel AI processing reduces manual work by 95%.

ai_secured.title: AI-Secured Infrastructure
ai_secured.description: Military-grade encryption with AI-powered threat detection, SOC 2 compliance, and zero-trust architecture for maximum security.

predictive.title: Predictive Analytics
predictive.description: Real-time AI dashboards with predictive modeling, anomaly detection, and intelligent forecasting for proactive decision-making.

benefits.title: Measurable AI Impact on Your Business

reduce_time.title: Reduce Processing Time by 95%
reduce_time.description: AI transforms weeks of manual review into seconds of automated analysis.

improve_fraud.title: Improve Fraud Detection by 99.9%
improve_fraud.description: Neural networks catch sophisticated fraud attempts invisible to human review.

increase_approval.title: Increase Approval Rates by 40%
increase_approval.description: AI discovers creditworthy applicants missed by traditional scoring methods.

scale_infinitely.title: Scale Infinitely with AI
scale_infinitely.description: Handle 100x more applications with AI agents working 24/7.

workflow.title: How Our AI Works
workflow.subtitle: Simple integration, revolutionary AI results. Deploy advanced neural networks in hours, not months.

ingestion.title: AI Document Ingestion
ingestion.description: Upload documents through our secure API. Advanced OCR and computer vision instantly digitize and structure any financial document format.

analysis.title: Neural Network Analysis
analysis.description: Deep learning models extract data, verify authenticity, detect tampering, and perform comprehensive financial analysis with superhuman accuracy.

insights.title: Intelligent Insights
insights.description: Receive AI-generated reports with credit recommendations, risk scores, predictive analytics, and actionable insights for instant decisions.

industries.title: Trusted by Leading Financial Institutions
industries.subtitle: Our AI platform adapts to various financial sectors with specialized neural network models.

banks.title: Traditional Banks
banks.description: AI-powered mortgage processing, personal loans, and commercial lending with neural network document verification and predictive risk assessment.

multifinance.title: Multifinance
multifinance.description: Accelerate auto loans, equipment financing, and consumer credit decisions with deep learning document analysis and predictive modeling.

p2p.title: P2P Lending
p2p.description: Scale your platform with AI-powered borrower verification and neural network credit scoring for intelligent marketplace lending.

contact.title: Ready to Transform Your Credit Process with AI?
contact.subtitle: Join leading financial institutions already using Fineksi to process applications with superhuman speed, accuracy, and security.

calendly.title: Schedule Your AI Demo
calendly.description: Book a personalized demonstration of our AI-powered document automation platform. See how Fineksi can transform your credit process in just 30 minutes.
calendly.alternative_description: Reach out via email or phone for immediate assistance.

footer.description: Empowering financial institutions with next-generation AI, neural networks, and cognitive automation for superhuman lending decisions.
footer.copyright: Powered by Advanced Neural Networks. All rights reserved.

hero.title: Comprehensive AI Document Analysis Platform
hero.subtitle: Transform any financial document into actionable insights with our advanced AI technology. From bank statements to legal contracts, our neural networks process everything with superhuman accuracy.

documents.title: AI-Powered Analysis for Every Document Type
documents.subtitle: Our advanced neural networks can process and analyze any financial document with unprecedented accuracy and speed.

bank_statement.title: Bank Statement Analysis
bank_statement.description: AI-powered analysis of bank statements with transaction categorization, cash flow analysis, and fraud detection.

financial_statement.title: Financial Statement Analysis
financial_statement.description: Comprehensive analysis of balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements with AI-driven insights.

legal_documents.title: Legal Document Processing
legal_documents.description: AI analysis of business registrations, contracts, and legal documents with compliance verification.

collateral_documents.title: Collateral Document Analysis
collateral_documents.description: Automated processing of property certificates, vehicle ownership documents, and asset valuations.

identity_documents.title: Identity Document Verification
identity_documents.description: AI-powered verification of KTP, NPWP, tax cards, and other identification documents with fraud detection.

invoice_documents.title: Invoice & Purchase Order Analysis
invoice_documents.description: Automated processing of invoices, purchase orders, and commercial documents with data extraction.

additional.title: And Many More Document Types
additional.description: Our AI platform continuously learns and adapts to process new document types. Whatever your financial institution needs, we can handle it.

workflow.title: How Our AI Solution Works
workflow.subtitle: A simple 4-step process that transforms complex document analysis into instant, actionable insights.

upload.title: User Uploads
upload.description: Securely upload documents through our API or web interface. Our system accepts any format and ensures data privacy.

ai_process.title: AI Processing
ai_process.description: Advanced neural networks extract, analyze, and validate document data with 99.8% accuracy in seconds.

human_validation.title: Human Validation
human_validation.description: Expert analysts review AI results for quality assurance and handle edge cases for maximum accuracy.

insights_ready.title: Insights Ready
insights_ready.description: Receive comprehensive credit analysis reports with risk scores, recommendations, and actionable insights.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our AI Document Solutions

speed.title: Lightning-Fast Processing
speed.description: Process complete loan applications in seconds instead of days. Our AI works 24/7 without breaks.

accuracy.title: Superhuman Accuracy
accuracy.description: 99.8% accuracy rate with advanced fraud detection that catches what human reviewers miss.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: Built-in compliance checks ensure all processed documents meet regulatory requirements and standards.

cost_effective.title: Cost-Effective Solution
cost_effective.description: Reduce operational costs by 95% while improving processing speed and accuracy significantly.

cta.title: Transform Your Document Processing Today
cta.subtitle: Join leading financial institutions using Fineksi to process documents with AI-powered speed, accuracy, and intelligence.

hero.title: Pioneering the Future of AI-Powered Finance
hero.subtitle: We're revolutionizing financial services with cutting-edge artificial intelligence, neural networks, and cognitive automation to create superhuman lending capabilities.

mission.title: Democratizing AI for Financial Excellence
mission.description1: At Fineksi, we believe that every financial institution deserves access to world-class artificial intelligence. Our mission is to transform the lending landscape through advanced neural networks, cognitive automation, and predictive analytics.
mission.description2: We're not just building software – we're creating an AI-powered ecosystem that empowers banks, multifinance companies, and P2P platforms to make faster, more accurate, and more inclusive lending decisions.

values.title: Built on Trust, Powered by Innovation
values.subtitle: Our core values guide every AI model we train and every solution we deliver.

excellence.title: AI Excellence
excellence.description: We push the boundaries of what's possible with artificial intelligence, constantly innovating to deliver superhuman performance in financial analysis.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Our AI models are explainable and auditable. We believe in transparent algorithms that financial institutions can trust and regulators can understand.

security.title: Security First
security.description: Every AI system we build incorporates military-grade security, ensuring your data and your customers' information remain protected at all times.

success.title: Customer Success
success.description: Your success is our success. We're committed to delivering AI solutions that drive measurable business outcomes and competitive advantages.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Like our AI models, we never stop learning. We continuously improve our technology and adapt to the evolving needs of the financial industry.

ethical.title: Ethical AI
ethical.description: We're committed to responsible AI development, ensuring our models are fair, unbiased, and promote financial inclusion for all communities.

team.title: World-Class AI Experts
team.subtitle: Our team combines decades of experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and financial technology to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Experience the Future of Finance?
cta.subtitle: Discover how Fineksi can transform your lending operations with cutting-edge artificial intelligence and neural network technology.

hero.title: Terms and Conditions
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Fineksi services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Fineksi's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services.
acceptance.additional: These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use our AI-powered document automation and credit analysis services.

service_description.title: 2. Service Description
service_description.content: Fineksi provides artificial intelligence-powered document automation, fraud detection, and credit analysis services to financial institutions including banks, multifinance companies, and peer-to-peer lending platforms.
services: AI-powered document processing and data extraction
Neural network-based fraud and tampering detection
Cognitive credit risk analysis and scoring

user_responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
user_responsibilities.warning: Users must ensure compliance with all applicable financial regulations and data protection laws in their jurisdiction when using our AI services.
user_responsibilities.content: As a user of our services, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information when using our services
Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
Use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with applicable regulations
Not attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or extract our AI algorithms
Comply with all data protection and privacy laws applicable to your jurisdiction
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy and data security are fundamental to Fineksi's AI-powered financial services.

overview.title: Privacy Overview
overview.content: Fineksi is committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the highest standards of data security. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, process, and safeguard information when you use our AI-powered document automation and credit analysis services.

account.title: Account Information
items: Name, email address, and contact information
Company name and business details
Account credentials and authentication data
Billing and payment information

financial.title: Financial Documents and Data
items: Documents uploaded for AI processing (bank statements, loan applications, etc.)
Extracted data from financial documents
Credit scores and financial analysis results
Fraud detection and risk assessment data

usage.title: Usage and Technical Data
items: API usage logs and performance metrics
System access logs and security events
Device information and IP addresses
Service usage patterns and preferences

data_security.title: 3. Data Security Measures
data_security.content: We implement military-grade security measures to protect your data throughout its lifecycle:

encryption.title: Encryption & Protection
items: AES-256 encryption for data at rest
TLS 1.3 encryption for data in transit
End-to-end encryption for sensitive documents
Regular security audits and penetration testing

access.title: Access Controls
items: Multi-factor authentication (MFA)
Role-based access control (RBAC)
Zero-trust security architecture
Continuous monitoring and logging

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
